task: Create a JSON configuration object for an AWS Lambda function that processes S3 events with a 5-minute timeout and 512MB memory allocation
Write a Python function that takes an AWS IAM policy document (as a dictionary) and returns a list of all the resource ARNs that are granted access
Create a regex pattern that validates AWS S3 bucket names according to AWS naming rules (3-63 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens, must start and end with alphanumeric)
